DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Satisfaction Patients Undergoing Non Surgical Lifting Means Coned Wires .
DOC.detailed_description: 243 patient underwent non-surgical con wire ( silhouette soft ) facial cervical lift October 2013 November 2014 . The procedure execute aesthetic clinic Milan , Bologna , Turin , Genoa , Rome , Asti , San Remo Palermo . Among 243 patient , 217 female 26 male , age range 19 76 year . 103 patient underwent facial lift , 12 frontal area , 61 cheek malar area , 30 area . 39 patient underwent cervical lift , 14 mean appliance 1 2 wire , 25 mean appliance 2 wire . 101 patient underwent facial cervical non surgical lift . We send every patient email questionnaire1 week , 1 month , 6 month 1 year treatment . In questionnaire , patient ask enter value 1 5 subjective satisfaction regard aesthetic improvement ( range 1 , poor , 5 , excellent ) , discomfort relate treatment ( range 1 , perceive discomfort , 5 , impossibility execute work social activity ) . The data analyze related factor : - number wire apply patient - aesthetic regenerative medicine treatment execute patient year - total expenditure relate aesthetic treatment year
